member.name: M:CarTrade.Menus.StartGame
member.summary: Collects all needed information about the game, as difficulty, amount of players and nicks of players
member.returns: List of with all player names difficulty and amount of players in it

member.name: M:CarTrade.Menus.MainMenu(CarTrade.Player)
member.summary: Shows Main Menu for a player with actions that player can do
member.param: Takes as param for current player info
member.returns: ConsoleKeyInfo for Game to work on what player choose
